price: Yεde nimdeε bεkenkan (wͻn ho nsεm) akyerε wͻn na Yɛnfirii (wͻn ho) da.
arabic: فَلَنَقُصَّنَّ عَلَيۡهِم بِعِلۡمٖۖ وَمَا كُنَّا غَآئِبِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: falanaquṣṣanna ʿalayhim biʿil'min wamā kunnā ghāibīna
